verses.roman:
prabhura rūpa-prema dekhi' ha-ila camatkāra
premāveśe prabhure karena namaskāra

synonyms: prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; rūpa-prema—personal beauty and ecstatic love; dekhi'-seeing; ha-ila camatkāra—became astonished; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; prabhure—to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karena namaskāra—offers obeisances.
translation: Upon seeing the Lord's personal beauty and ecstatic love, Kṛṣṇadāsa was very astonished. Out of ecstatic love, he offered his respectful obeisances unto the Lord.
